name: might-core
description: A set of functions and variables shared between might-related packages

scripts.build: npx tsc --module commonjs --target ES2019 --lib ES2019 -d --removeComments src/*.ts --outDir build
scripts.watch: npx tsc --module commonjs --target ES2019 --lib ES2019 -d -w src/*.ts --outDir build

author: Kerolos Zaki
